message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I understand your point, Bob, but I think we can both get closer to a fair deal. Let's try this.

I'm willing to split the money evenly again, Bob. We can keep going back and forth, but inflation will only hurt me. Let's make this quick.
